{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C7 |revision=v4.x |series=AC1750 |asin=B00CEB53MS |newegg=N82E16833704177 |fcc_date=11/03/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C7V4 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=750 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q128CSIG |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M14D1G1664A-2.5B |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9563;QCA9563-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337N;QCA8337N-AL3C; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=U-Boot |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_2.4GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,, ^TP-LINK_5GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-C7.html Product page] {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-C7_V4}}
